meanings.definition: The process of grinding a substance to a fine powder.
meanings.sent1: Levigation involves grinding substances into very fine powders.
meanings.sent2: The levigation of spices is essential for making flavorful dishes.
meanings.sent3: I tried levigation with a rock, but it just made a mess!
meanings.sent4: Her skill in levigation turned the rough stones into a smooth, fine dust.
meanings.sent5: The levigation of the cocoa beans created a silky chocolate powder.

meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef levigated the salt so vigorously it flew everywhere!
meanings.sent4: His determination to levigate the ore paid off with a valuable powder.
meanings.sent5: The mill levigated the grains into a smooth flour for baking.
